entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 11:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: SW 23 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
